code: import React from'react';import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";function Chart(props){var sickData=props.countryInfo.country[0].history;var deadData=props.countryInfo.country[1].history;var recoveredData=props.countryInfo.country[2].history;var data={labels:Object.keys(sickData),datasets:[{label:'Sick',backgroundColor:'lightgray',data:Object.values(sickData)},{label:'Dead',backgroundColor:'darkred',data:Object.values(deadData)},{label:'Recovered',backgroundColor:'green',data:Object.values(recoveredData)}]};function handleBack(){props.goBack();}return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement(Line,{data:data,options:{responsive:true}}),React.createElement("div",{className:"less-info",onClick:handleBack},React.createElement("h4",null,"Less info")));}export default Chart;
